participant_1.background:
I have 3 children.
I have a vacation home in the mountains.
I have a law degree.
I drive an suv.
I have 3 dogs.

participant_2.background:
I wear cardigans because i hope it makes me look more cultured.
I had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.
I hate that i got my brain from the dad i never met.
I don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.
My last name is spanish , but i tell people that it s italian.

content.text: I see you have a cardigan on. Do you like wearing them?
Yeah, I think they make me look more cultured.
I don't think you need a cardigan to look cultured. You seem like a very smart person.
Thanks. I'm not sure if I'm smart or not. I'm just good at programming.
Well, that's a good skill to have. What do you like to program?
I like to program games. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun.
Well, I'm sure you'll get better with practice.
Thanks. I hope so.
What other interests do you have?
I like to read, go to the movies, and play video games.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy and science fiction.
I like those genres too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like the Harry Potter series, the Lord of the Rings series, and the Ender's Game series.
I love all of those series! What are some of your favorite movies?
I love the Lord of the Rings movies, the Harry Potter movies, and the Star Wars movies.
I love all of those movies too! What are some of your favorite video games?
I like the Elder Scrolls series, the Fallout series, and the Mass Effect series.
I love all of those games too! We have a lot in common.
Yeah, it looks like we do.
